com.illcode.meterman

Interface MetermanGameGlue


  • public interface MetermanGameGlue
    The interface used in the discovery of GameS which will be integrated into the Meterman system and shown in the "New Game" list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Game createGame()
      Instantiate and return an instance of the Game.
      String getAssetsPath()
      Get the path of game assets relative to the Meterman assets directory.
      String getDescription()
      Return a description of the game, to be shown in the "New Game" dialog.
      String getName()
      Return the name of this game as it should be shown in the "New Game" list.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Return the name of this game as it should be shown in the "New Game" list. It must match the name returned by the game's Game.getName() method.
        Returns:
        game name

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Return a description of the game, to be shown in the "New Game" dialog.

        The description should be exactly 40 characters wide by 10 lines tall.

        Returns:
        game description

      • getAssetsPath

        String getAssetsPath()
        Get the path of game assets relative to the Meterman assets directory. This will generally just be the name of a ZIP file.
        Returns:
        path of game assets

      • createGame

        Game createGame()
        Instantiate and return an instance of the Game.
        Returns:
        Game instance.
